## User story

As a **<type of user>**  
I want **<a capability or behaviour>**  
So that **<the benefit or outcome>**

---

## Acceptance criteria

This story is done when:

- [ ] …
- [ ] …
- [ ] …

(Use clear, testable statements. Avoid describing how it will be implemented.)

- Any known constraints, assumptions, or context
